name: Clearbit
description: Reveal anonymous users from your website and enrich them with the data you need

private_settings.name: api_key
private_settings.title: Clearbit API Key
private_settings.description: Use the secret API key from https://dashboard.clearbit.com/api

private_settings.name: enrich_info
private_settings.title: Enrichment
private_settings.description: Transform the email address or domain in a person or company profile with more than 85 data points.

private_settings.name: enrich_segments
private_settings.title: Enrich users belonging to one of these segments

private_settings.name: enrich_segments_hero
private_settings.headerTemplate:
The above list of segments is a whitelist. You need to *explicitely specify one or more segments* for which enrichment shall be performed.
If you do not specify any segment, no user will be sent to Clearbit's API. An empty list has the same effect as disabling the feature via the checkbox.
private_settings.title: Whitelisted Segments

private_settings.name: reveal_information
private_settings.title: - Precondition -
private_settings.headerTemplate: Reveal will only work with anonymous users. You need to enable **Anonymous Users** from your [Dashboard Settings](../../settings/user_settings) to store anonymous website traffic in Hull.

private_settings.name: reveal_trigger_prospector_info
private_settings.title: How does the trigger work?
private_settings.headerTemplate: The trigger let's you define when our connector automatically runs the Prospector workflow by defining the number of distinct users from the same IP address. As soon as this threshold is met, the connector will run the Prospect workflow if enabled.

private_settings.name: discovery_info
private_settings.title: Discovery
private_settings.description: The Discovery API lets you search for companies that are similar to your existing customers.

private_settings.name: discover_segments
private_settings.title: Search for companies similar to the ones in these segments

private_settings.name: discover_segments_info
private_settings.title: Segmentation Tip
private_settings.headerTemplate: The connector uses the segments as whitelist to tigger the Clearbit flow for finding companies with a similar profile. We recommend to use only segments that describe your targeted company profiles.

private_settings.name: discover_limit_count
private_settings.title: Maximum number of companies to fetch

private_settings.name: prospect_domain
private_settings.title: Attribute that defines the company domain
private_settings.description: The connector will use the value of this attribute as domain when fetching people from Clearbit.

private_settings.name: prospect_segments
private_settings.title: Fetch prospects for companies in these segments

private_settings.name: prospect_segments_info
private_settings.title: Segmentation Tip
private_settings.headerTemplate: The connector uses the segments as whitelist to tigger the Clearbit flow for finding leads within accounts that match your targeted profiles. We recommend to use only segments that describe your targeted company profiles.

private_settings.name: prospect_limit_count
private_settings.title: Maximum number of leads to fetch per company

private_settings.name: prospect_filter_info
private_settings.title: > DESCRIBE YOUR IDEAL LEAD <
private_settings.headerTemplate: Search by role, seniority or title to identify your ideal prospects.

private_settings.name: prospect_filter_role
private_settings.title: Filter for a certain Role
private_settings.description: Specify a certain role or leave blank to search without restriction.

private_settings.name: prospect_filter_seniority
private_settings.title: Filter for specific Seniority
private_settings.description: Define a specific seniority or leave blank if you don't want to restrict your search.

private_settings.name: prospect_filter_titles
private_settings.title: Search for Titles containing
private_settings.description: Restrict your search by specifying criteria for the prospect's title. If left blank, search is carried out without restriction.
